processMessage

public void processMessage(Message msg)
Description copied from class: Client
Whenever a message is received by the message listener, this method is called. The child classes extended from Client can overwrite this method to implement their own functionalities.

Overrides:
processMessage in class Client
Parameters:
msg - The new message received from the communication interface (from Broker.)

handleCommand

public CommandResult handleCommand(String commandString)
                            throws ParseException
Description copied from class: Client
Runs a particular command via appropriate command handler. The result is returned in the CommandResult data structure.

Overrides:
handleCommand in class Client
Parameters:
commandString - The command string to be run. It includes command, its options, and arguments all separated by space. It is upto the relavant command handler to distinguish between comand, options, and arguments.
Returns:
A CommandResult data structure which includes the result of running the command. In case of an error, it as well is stored in the returned data strucute.
Throws:
ParseException
See Also:
CommandResult
